org.anarres.gradle.plugin.stdproject

Class StdProjectExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      • org.anarres.gradle.plugin.stdproject.StdProjectExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    groovy.lang.GroovyObject

    public class StdProjectExtension
extends groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
    The standard project plugin extension. This allows configuring the standard project plugin using a stdproject { } block.
